title: Handle a Paratransit No-Show
description: A paratransit vehicle arrives to pick up a passenger, but the passenger is not there. The driver must report the no-show.

tasks.description: The driver arrives at the pickup location at the scheduled time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is on time at the correct location.

tasks.description: The driver waits for the required period (e.g., 5 minutes).
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver follows the waiting policy.

tasks.description: The driver contacts dispatch to report that the passenger is a no-show.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatch is notified of the no-show.

tasks.description: Dispatch logs the no-show event on the passenger's account (as excessive no-shows can lead to suspension) and instructs the driver to proceed to their next pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: The no-show is recorded, and the driver continues their route.
